name: Unisex Mirror Tailored T-shirt
description:
This black cotton T-shirt features loose fit, prolonged sleeves, round neckline and rectangular (24x39cm) mirror-like print on the front side. It can be also worn as a dress over tights or leggings. Sleeves can be loose or rolled up upon your wish. Black embroidered satin label inside.

100% cotton. Hand wash only.

Measurements:

Small: length 75cm/29.53", chest 50cm/19.68", outside sleeve 19cm/7.48", shoulders 60cm/23.62"

Medium: length 77.5cm/30.51", chest 53cm/20.87", outside sleeve 21cm/8.27", shoulders 60cm/23.62"

Large: length 80cm/31.50", chest 56cm/22.05", outside sleeve 21cm/8.27", shoulders 66cm/25.98"

Free standard worldwide delivery.

name: Unisex Shiny Black Tailored T-shirt
description:
This T-shirt features loose fit, prolonged sleeves, round neckline, shiny black polyester top part with sleeves and soft black viscose bottom part. It is well designed and proportioned and gives a great layered look with play of textures, but keeps a simple silhouette and classic black color. It can be also worn as a dress over tights or leggings, bottom part can be comfortably tucked into high waisted skirt, shorts or trousers. Black embroidered satin label inside.

Shiny part 100% polyester.
Bottom part 97% viscose, 3% elastane.
Hand wash only.

Measurements:

Medium: length 79cm/31.10", chest 53cm/20.87", outside sleeve 20cm/7.87", shoulders 63cm/24.80"

Large: length 80cm/31.50", chest 56cm/22.05", outside sleeve 21cm/8.27", shoulders 66cm/25.98"

Free standard worldwide delivery.

name: Unisex Silver Carpet Tailored Top
description:
This dress-like T-shirt features long fit, prolonged sleeves, round neckline and is made of shiny silver polyester with soft cotton carpet print on front. Smooth cosmic textile looks incredible on a skin while carpet print gives unusual effect. It can be worn as a dress over your trousers, tights or leggings. White embroidered satin label inside.

Shiny part 100% polyester. 
Front part 100% cotton. 
Hand wash only.
